comment: "Did not receive contract until after article had been submitted (article was NOT on spec--editor was just slow to send). Would have negotiated a higher price before writing had I seen the terms sooner. Also, they require a blank check before they can set up payment, which is difficult if you don't have checks anymore like most people! Editor changes added grammatical & punctuation errors to the work. That said, editor is polite & you only have to complete the paperwork once, so I would write for them again."
